Params: {1: 'Journey of Torture', 2: 'Chapter 2', 3: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Atlas/CommonLogo/BgLogo1.png'}
{1: 'ThemeEnable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory12.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Celica', 3: 'Gray Raven, did you parachute back to Earth safely this time?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'You know, aside from having to pass through the giant and murderous belt of space debris corrupted by the virus, everything was fine.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Because of the mobility of the drop pod, we managed to pass through that area without requiring support. There was no better way of landing, Lee.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'Lucia... I think Lee was just... joking.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: 'Well, good to see you all getting along.', 4: '1'}

{2: 'Celica', 3: 'I\'ll spare the pleasantries. Your mission this time is to defeat the special Corrupted model named "Iron Maiden"", and retrieve from her more information about the ""Ascendants".', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: 'According to the other squads, this Corrupted in particular has high combative capabilities.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: 'To complete this objective, you must first coordinate with other squads and set up Iso-Devices in specific locations of the city. This will create a small isolation zone.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: 'These isolation zones will form a ring, ultimately containing the movement area of the target.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "It's been a long time since we've gone on a mission like this.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Yes, it only shows that the enemy is a force to be reckoned with.', 4: '2'}

{2: 'Celica', 3: 'Indeed. The enemy is powerful. Any squads coming into contact with the "Iron Maiden" must immediately contact all the other squads and wait for backup. Do not engage on your own.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Understood.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: "There are sealed Iso-Devices near your landing zone. You'll have to find access to it to utilize them.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: 'One more thing, HQ has sent a Construct in your vicinity to aid you in your mission... You should make contact soon.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: 'With that, I wish you all a smooth mission.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{2: 'System', 3: 'Disconnected—'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'Lee, do you know about the Iso-Devices?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Yes. It's something from Cosmos Technician Union. It emanates a Corrupted-repelling field for a certain amount of time.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "But setting it up will take time. It's also quite weighty and unwieldy—typical of those technicians...", 4: '2'}

{2: 'Liv', 3: "Speaking of production... The first thing I knew about you was that you're skilled technician, Lee. I even thought you were Cosmos Technician Union. I had no idea that you were actually from Kurono.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "I was just a non-staff personnel. Didn't stay there long.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Are you the Construct that Celica mentioned? The one coming to support us?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Indeed... Walking the path of heavens... The Construct who will rule everything... My name is... Nanami!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'Nanami, why are you alone outside? What mission were you on before?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Nanami's always been by herself!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Um, what was I doing just now? Those graffiti looked super-duper interesting so Nanami decided to take a walk around to see more of it.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Alrighty, Nanami's ready to dance!", 4: '1'}
